打折刚入手，玩了几盘，觉得很不错。玩逃生者很刺激，玩杀手比较老火，排人很慢，另外我闪退了一次，不过还是推荐打折入手。这两周基本天天都有玩，先说不好的。还是服务器，老是出错，特别是玩杀手，匹配十几分钟，出个错就没了，很难受。其他的就非常快乐了，无论是杀手还是逃生者，玩的都很快乐。特别是昨晚一盘逃生者，可以四杀的杀手玩家选择了放跑我和另一名菜鸟队友，当时就剩我们俩，和四台没修的电机，以为没了，结果杀手朋友选择放我们，看着我们修完，放我们出去，非常感谢你哟！

Games massively inconsistent,  Almost every killer is overpowered for example if you get The Pig just instantly quit.. because if it isn't the fact you can't detect her then the mask is even more retarded. fuck this game.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
After playing the game a bit more and learning it overall the game is fun and competitive. However my original comment about inconsistent still stands. The servers are sided on the killer so sometimes the hits and pallet drops are wacky. 

Game can very easily frustrate you with the suicide hooks and overall people being not very bright. Killer queues are insanely long so hence i am survivor main. Every now and then you'll meet that bitter killer who you have looped majority of the game just tunnel you and camp you again frustrating but the good moments make up for it.

This is not a game you pick up and instanly be sick at. you will need patience
This game is so much fun!

Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical (would'nt say 'horror') multiplayer game. The mechanics of the game have improved over time, I'd say the developers try their best to hear us out and do the best. As regards the gameplay, It can be stressful and discouraging or simply fun af. Why? Because this is an online multiplayer. It depends on the people on the other side of your screen If you'll be having a good or bad time. When survivors play in teams and collaborate it's high likely you'll have a great time. If they don't, then it's the opposite. As a Killer you're outnumbered, but you have great skills to keep jumping on survivors. However, it is not always fun. You can always end up facing survivors who clearly know what they are doing and give you a hard time. Overall, my belief is that if you wanna enjoy this game in both sides (killer/surv) it's a must to practice, learn and repeat. Don't let trolls get into your head and just try to enjoy. It's a great game!
I freaking love this game! The dedicated servers are not perfect, they can really work on it but if you play this with friends or people you can talk to it's pretty addictive.

Fun for a bit, the it just feels like the same game repeating, no matter how many different killers. Killers are more fun because of their abilities, but it still gets really repetitive. I recommend playing with 4 friends so you can joke around. Playing seriously just gets boring after a bit.

UPDATE: Saw Pyramid Head was released so I figured "Why not, lets see if it's improved." Still repetitive. Matchmaking seems better because crossplay. Archive actually gives some goals, but it's still pretty boring. Not to mention if you are trying to play killer there are a bunch of afk killers that clog up the queue
